description: Handheld High Pressure Mass Spectrometry Detection System
full_summary:
### Original Tender Announcement Cancelled

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has cancelled the original tender announcement for "M7594-233692 Handheld High Pressure Mass Spectrometry Detection System" with reference number WS4328596170.

### New Tender Description

However, a new tender description has been released for the procurement of a Handheld High Pressure Mass Spectrometry (HPMS) system from the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). The RCMP requires the procurement of four (4) HPMS systems for the detection of vapour, aerosols, liquid, and solids from trace to bulk values for narcotics, explosives, and Chemical Warfare Agents (CWA).

The tender includes one (1) entity software license necessary for the operation of all HPMS systems as well as a training course for up to ten (10) participants. All the deliverables must be received on or before March 31st, 2024.

A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

- **Reference Number**: WS4328596170
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4328596170
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-29
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-14T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-28
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-12-28
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Trade Agreements**: Various Free Trade Agreements including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
